content.rendered:
Directed by Jeethu Joseph

Written by Oriol Paulo

Cast Emraan Hashmi (Ajay Puri). Rishi Kapoor (SP Jairaj Rawal). Sobhita Dhulipala (Maya Verma). Vedhika (Ritu / Isha (as Vedhika Kumar)). Anupam Bhattacharya (Pawanmeet). Chandan Anand (Keith). Arif Zakaria (Sekhawat). Rukhsar Rehman (Dr. Tanya). Rajesh Khatri (Tara Singh). Rajoshi Vidyarthi (Nancy Rawal). Amit Naik (Tony D’Costa). Elisha Mayor (Shaina). Priyanka Sodoo (Manisha – Waitress). Scarlett Mellish Wilson (Dancer in song ‘Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Reloaded’). Natasa Stankovic (Dancer in song ‘Jhalak Dikhla Jaa Reloaded’). Meenakshi (Child Isha) . Tawhid Rike Zaman (Rahul)

Languages Hindi. English

Producers Arfaz Ayub. Suresh Balaje. Gagan J.S. Bindra. Gaurav Bose. Nikita Katakwar. Sunir Kheterpal. Amit Ajit Naik. Sachin Pathak. George Pius

Production Azure Entertainment. Viacom1
